title: Fairytale Green
description: She could never predict a tattooed giant to be thrown into her life.Ella Miller is not a massive believer in love. Especially in high school. Sure, she thinks that it is good in movies and books, but real life is not exactly a fairytale. Although things might take a turn at the arrival of a large, tattooed male.This fiery green haired girl was in for a challenge as one night, she runs into a mountain sized problem. A ridiculously good looking, dark and broody problem. She thinks that she will only have to deal with this large and slightly terrifying looking guy for one night but that quickly changes. Being thrown together at every opportunity, she has no other choice but to deal with possessive, protective and pain in the ass Stone who happens to enjoy teasing and being around Ella constantly.It is the green haired nerd versus the motorbike-riding giant but are they really against each other? Stone is mysterious and has dark secrets. He is not exactly Prince Charming. However, Ella is no Princess. If only they drew back the swords and lived some sort of happily ever after.
author: Kayla  Silvers
